content: >these ribbed socks for baby are stretchy enough to stay up all day when knit in patons stretch socks *patons yarns* skill level intermediate sizes yo fit 3 6 12 18/24 mos materials patons® stretch socks 50 g /1 75 oz 239 yd /218 m 31014 caramel cream stripes 1 ball set of four size 3 25 mm u s 3 double-pointed knitting needles patons® stretch socks ombres yarn produces a striped effect when knit grafting diagram is included in pdf download august 2011
